headline: What American Water Works Company (AWK)'s PENNVEST-Funded Infrastructure Upgrades Could Mean for Shareholders
summary: Earlier in October 2025, the Shapiro administration announced that Pennsylvania American Water secured US$64,396,571 in grants and low-interest loans from PENNVEST to fund water infrastructure projects in four Pennsylvania counties. This funding enables upgrades including PFAS treatment facilities and lead line replacements, directly supporting the company's efforts to meet stricter regulatory standards and enhance water quality for customers. With substantial new infrastructure funding...
